author: Maksym "Maks" Pazuniak
description: With a whopping 15ml of bitters on top of 15ml amaro (Italian for bitter) and a punchy 45ml high-proof rye whiskey, this cocktail perhaps would have been better named Momentary Lapse of Reason after the Pink Floyd track. However, the rich apricot brandy rounds and mellows to make this cocktail surprisingly approachable, although still spirituous. Perhaps consider using the following measures to reduce the serve, and so the booze, by a third:Rinse - 5ml Red bitter liqueur30ml (1oz) Rye whiskey20ml (2/3oz) Apricot brandy10ml (1/3oz) Amaro Averna10ml (1/3oz) Angostura bitters5ml (1/6oz) Straight bottled-in-bond applejack
name: A Moment of Silence
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE a chilled glass with red bitter liqueur and set to one side
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled, pre-rinsed glass
